title: vanishing games?
body: This is about the second or third time ever this has happened to me, but im curious because it just happened now, I was just in a match and started "attempting to reconnect" but took a bit so i left and waited to rejoin but the game just vanished and there is no match history for it, just curious to if its happened to anyone else and why is happens?(super rare so doesnt matter a great deal)

replies.body:
From what I understand, if all players in a given match leave or are disconnected, the match will not be recorded and, thus, will seemingly disappear. That's based on personal experience, so I'm not too sure how close to the truth it is. It's possible there was some issue that caused all players in that match to DC, which would have resulted in the match "disappearing".

Probably the best thing to do is submit a ticket to [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) with as much info as you can give, and hopefully they'll be able to find out what causes the issue at some point and be able to do something about it.
that is correct, they disappear when everyone disconnects, usually due to a large loss of packets from the servers when they try hotfix small things.
Same problem happening to me and a mate in ranked twice now
